legend_0040_friend_01: I’m sure there’s some here, too...[npcn:6]
legend_0040_friend_03: I knew it! I spy Herba Mystica![npcn:6]
legend_0040_friend_04: Another successful search! We’re on a roll![npcn:6]
legend_0040_friend_05:
Now then, let’s see... What does the book have
to say?[npcn:6]
legend_0040_friend_a:
It says here that the [clr:6]Sweet Herba Mystica[clr:0] is good
for gut health and that it helps aid digestion.\c
Says it’s great for stomachaches, too, or when
you want to stimulate the ol’ appetite![npcn:6]
legend_0040_friend_b:
Well, apparently [clr:6]Salty Herba Mystica[clr:0] helps with
aching hands and feet. Good for neuropathy and\r
numbness.\c
When you’ve got muscle weakness, it supposedly
builds up strength again![npcn:6]
legend_0040_friend_c:
[clr:6]Bitter Herba Mystica[clr:0]’s great for your circulation!
It really gets the blood flowing!\c
And that warms you right up, nice and toasty,
even boosting the immune system!\c
...Or so it says.[npcn:6]
legend_0040_friend_d:
OK, [clr:6]Sour Herba Mystica[clr:0] is chock-full of nutrients
and is great for boosting your overall health!\c
Says here it works wonders whether you’re tired
physically or mentally. Perks you right up![npcn:6]
legend_0040_friend_e:
So it seems [clr:6]Spicy Herba Mystica[clr:0]’s supposed to
boost your metabolism!\c
It gives your circulation a boost and helps flush
out all those toxins...along with a ton of sweat![npcn:6]
legend_0040_friend_06: This’ll definitely help Mabosstiff feel even better![npcn:6]
legend_0040_friend_07:
[BD06:0]Come on, [trnm:0]... Let’s get
some\r
food\r
going![npcn:6]
legend_0040_friend_08:
Sorry to keep ya waiting!\c
Here you go: another of your favorite ol’
Arven sandwiches![npcn:6]
legend_0040_friend_09:
And it comes with a special Titan Badge!\c
The Pokémon League might not recognize it,
but I hope you appreciate it all the same![npcn:6]
legend_0040_friend_10:
Figured this might happen. Don’t worry—I made
extra this time for that brute of yours.[npcn:6]
legend_0040_system_02:
[BD06:0]Do you want to give your sandwich
to [pknm:1]?
legend_0040_system_03:
[BD06:0]Maybe you want to give your sandwich to
[pknm:1]\r
after all?
legend_0040_friend_11:
Come on out, Mabosstiff. Got some for you,
too, bud.[npcn:6]
legend_0040_friend_12: That’s it. Small bites, small bites...[npcn:6]
legend_0040_system_04: [pknm:1] will be able to dash now!
legend_0040_system_05:
[BD06:0][pknm:1] will be able to jump
higher now!
legend_0040_system_06: [BD06:0][pknm:1] will be able to glide now!
legend_0040_system_07:
[BD06:0][pknm:1] will be able to move across the
water now!
legend_0040_system_08:
[BD06:0][pknm:1] will be able to climb up
vertical\r
surfaces\r
now!
legend_0040_friend_13:
C’mon... At least bother to taste it before you
swallow it right down, would you?[npcn:6]
legend_0040_friend_14:
This brute seems to be benefiting from the herbs
too, I guess—in its own sorta way.[npcn:6]
legend_0040_friend_15:
[BD06:0]Oh yeah! ’Fore I forget,
[trnm:0]...\r
Take\r
another\r
look\r
at\r
this.[npcn:6]
legend_0040_friend_16:
There’s always a Titan Pokémon near the Herba
Mystica when we find ’em, right?[npcn:6]
legend_0040_friend_17:
Like the book says, it’s not like big ol’ Pokémon
just happen to like these herbs.\c
It’s actually something in the herbs that’s making
the Titans so big and strong.[npcn:6]
legend_0040_friend_18:
So does that mean a Titan’s “lair” isn’t really
some kind of treasure hoard or whatever?\r
It’s just a pantry where the Titan keeps its food?[npcn:6]
legend_0040_friend_19: Oh. You done with your sandwich, Mabosstiff?[npcn:6]
legend_0040_friend_21:
[BD06:0]You...you heard that, right,
[trnm:0]?\r
Mabosstiff\r
just\r
woofed!\r
Right?![npcn:6]
legend_0040_friend_23:
No! No, no, no, no, no! I’m sure I heard it!
You must’ve heard it too!\c
Sure you don’t need to get your ears checked?[npcn:6]
legend_0040_friend_24: See! See that! I knew I wasn’t just hearing things![npcn:6]
legend_0040_friend_25:
Oh, Mabosstiff! Who’s my best bud, huh?
Who’s the best of boys? You are, yes, you are![npcn:6]
legend_0040_friend_26:
*sniff*
It’s...it’s been so long since I heard that woof![npcn:6]
legend_0040_friend_28:
Ever since I teamed up with you, good things
keep happening![npcn:6]
legend_0040_friend_29:
But we’ve still got two more herbs to go.
Hope you’ll stick it out until we’re done![npcn:6]
